column2: the  trial  Court has  acted  in  violation  of Section  203  of  the  Code  of
Criminal Procedure Act No. 15 of 1979, in delivering its judgment,
the  trial  Court  permitted  the  prosecutor  to  elicit  evidence  of  bad
character and considered it in the judgment,
